Name: Text
Text Area 1: Doctor: "You a cop or something?" Companion: hi, Dr. ____. The detective is here about, … you know…

Name: Text
Text Area 1: Doctor: "Yeah, what do you care?" Companion: "hi, Dr. ____. This is Detective _____. He’s here about, … you know…"

Name: Text
Text Area 1:
Doctor:
You here about my wife then? Hopefully you’ll be more useful than that sorry excuse of a sheriff. Got most of the town talking about some stupid witch. Town full of hick buffoons. Why [wife name] wanted to stay in this godforsaken place, I’ll never know.

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Why don’t you think it was the witch?

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Any idea why she wanted to stay?

Name: Process
Text Area 1: What kind of man are you drinking yourself to death after what happened to your wife?

Name: Text
Text Area 1: Doctor: You’re kidding right? Don’t tell me you believe in that load of crap as well.

Name: Text
Text Area 1: Doctor: She wanted to be some sort of humanitarian, a hero. The brave city girl coming to save the lives of a bunch of poor hillbillies. What a load of crap. I had a future. She had a future. Now she’s dead and I’m stuck in the middle of nowhere doing checkups on some wrinkly old ballsacks. Goddammit all.  [Spouse Path]

Name: Text
Text Area 1: [Companion Response]: Well that’s quite rude of you Dr. ____. I’ll have you know some of us do want to get to the bottom of this. That’s why Detective ____ is here, after all.

Name: Process
Text Area 1: The doctor gets up and socks you in the face. He spits on you as you flail on the floor and leaves the bar [End Convo]

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Well, I suppose not

Name: Process

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Well, who do you think did it then?

Name: Process
Text Area 1: You think I spent all that time in medical school so that I could entertain children's fairy tales? Don't waste my time with these ridiculous questions.

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Seems pretty convincing to me.

Name: Process
Text Area 1: Just considering all the possibilites.

Text Area 1: I guess a part of me wants to know what happened.  Also, Sheriff _____ threatend to arrest me if I try to leave so... Try not to tell anyone about that. It's bad enough having the police down my neck.
